Tucson turns to Legacy on a dime.  He did not like his tone of voice, and f=
elt that his explanation could have been a little less brash.  Especially w=
hen you're addressing a Prime officer.  His expression hardens quickly.

" =
I appreciate your concerns but I do NOT appreciate your tone of voice!  It'=
s as if you're trying to stop me from doing what needs to be done!  This wa=
r can not be fought by ourselves, they out number us! And I will do everyth=
ing in my power to be sure that our numbers stay stable!"

Straight Shot sw=
allows hard, she holds Elita in her arms, knowing that when Tucson loses hi=
s temper, the whole planet would pretty much know that it was time to leave=
 him alone.

"Not good, so not good.  If there's one thing I learned was no=
t ta get on Tucson's bad side. Not pretty."

She turns to Rodimus.

" I've =
seen what happens when someone pushes his buttons the wrong way. He's like =
Ratchet, but kind of three times worse.  If he wants ta turn a bot inta  sc=
rap metal, he'll do it.  It's happened before..  Umm, maybe I shouldn't - h=
ave mentioned that huh?"

Quickstride now hears Tucson raising his voice, a=
nd looks up to him.

"Uh ohh..  Something tells me we better take cover."

=
It was apparent in the clenching of his fists, that Tucson was quite ready =
to defend his arguements in any means possible.  It was what he did when he=
 often lost his temper.  Straight Shot takes the brave step to try and calm=
 him down.

"Hey, maybe you guys can work something out?  You're right, we =
do need help but Legacy's right too.  It might upset the time balance if we=
 attempt ta wake up the Ark too soon."

Tucson turns to her.

" Remember wh=
at Master Yokitron told us vorns ago?"

She nodds.

"Yes, sometimes the unt=
hinkable must be the thinkable.  It was his way of saying that in desperate=
 times, desperate measures can not be avoided.  Even if the balance of time=
 does get disrupted."

He nodds.

" Exactly.  We need help, and maybe it is=
n't time to wake up Optimus Prime, but we must try and revive others to ass=
ist us in battle.  Legacy, I warn you now, insubordination will not be tole=
rated.  Am I understood?"
